characterDescription: Au-nak is a visiting dignitary doing business with Hatham. He is also the Natan ambassador, representing a dead kingdom that had been reduced to a single city-state on the eastern coast of Roshar with a few other cities as protectorates.

characterDetails.Appearance: Au-nak has bluish skin and stark white hair, yet two locks dyed a deep red and braided down to hang alongside his cheeks. He wears red gloves.
characterDetails.Personality:
Au-nak believes that all conflicts between nations are essentially economic, rather than religious, in nature.
Au-nak has always considered the order of Talenelat a Devotary for the lesser people.
characterDetails.Characteristics: In the high form of the Alethi language, Au-nak's his name is Nak-ali.
